title: Can't find custom game in match history

replies.body: I looked into this for you and do see a game as Sona.  It looks like it went unfinished, though, so that may be why it's not showing up!
I would also like to know if I could somehow recover that sona game to my match history or get the replay of it?
Afraid not.  :( We don't have access to replays.  It sounds like some epic stuff might have occurred, but I hope you might encounter more in the future!
Ah its ok! So for custom games to show up in your match history, you have to finish them (destroying the nexus or surrendering), correct?
Oh ok, so you have to destroy the nexus for it to show up? Thank you for responding :)
